[vc_row wrap_container=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1591579580025{margin-top: -224px !important;margin-bottom: 70px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_row_inner animation_delay=”100″ el_class=”background-color-light custom-icon-boxes py-5 justify-content-center no-padding mx-0″ animation_type=”fadeInUp”][vc_column_inner el_class=”py-4″ width=”1/2″ animation_delay=”300″ offset=”vc_col-md-4″ animation_type=”fadeInUp”]

Ethereum Audit

Our engineers are doing all types of security services related to Ethereum platform – Solidity smart contract audits, DApp security reviews and layer 2 / sidechain security assessments.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”py-4″ width=”1/2″ animation_delay=”500″ offset=”vc_col-md-4″ animation_type=”fadeInUp”]

EOS Audit

We provide EOS smart contract audit and DApp review for EOSIO-based projects. These services significantly reduce risks of your EOS application to be hacked.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”py-4″ width=”1/2″ animation_delay=”700″ offset=”vc_col-md-4″ animation_type=”fadeInUp”]

Tron Audit

TRON smart contracts are written in a high-level language; however, without a proper smart contract audit, the advantages of the protocol are useless. We conduct TRON smart contract audit to secure your clients, funds, and reputation

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner animation_delay=”100″ el_class=”background-color-light custom-icon-boxes py-5 justify-content-center no-padding mx-0″ animation_type=”fadeInUp”][vc_column_inner el_class=”py-4″ width=”1/2″ animation_delay=”300″ offset=”vc_col-md-4″ animation_type=”fadeInUp”]

Blockchain Protocol Security

Blockchain protocol security practice consists of 3 different services that cover all security aspects of custom blockchain implementation: protocol model security review, tokenomics review and protocol implementation security analysis.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”py-4″ width=”1/2″ animation_delay=”500″ offset=”vc_col-md-4″ animation_type=”fadeInUp”]

Formal Verification

The service supposes the use of math methods and symbolic analysis to prove that a system runs smoothly and correctly. Formal verification consists of validation and verification for better results.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”py-4″ width=”1/2″ animation_delay=”700″ offset=”vc_col-md-4″ animation_type=”fadeInUp”]

Certified

We perform analysis based on the expert knowledge of our specialists and issues certificates at the following aspects: Solvency, Liquidity, Cyber Security, and Community

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”middle” wrap_container=”yes” no_padding=”yes” el_class=”our-services position-relative”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1591345536643{background-image: url(//smcauditors.com/onoaltee/2020/06/bc2-bg-1.jpg?id=37) !important;background-position: 0 0 !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;}” offset=”vc_col-md-6 vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs” el_class=”pc-img-our-services section-angled-top-layer section-angled-bottom-layer”][/vc_column][vc_column offset=”vc_col-md-offset-7 vc_col-md-5″][vc_custom_heading text=”our services” font_container=”tag:h5|text_align:left|line_height:1.6″ use_theme_fonts=”yes” text_transform=”text-uppercase” font_weight=”600″ skin=”primary” letter_spacing=”0″ show_border=”yes” border_skin=”primary” border_type=”middle-border-reverse” border_size=”lg” animation_delay=”100″ animation_type=”fadeInLeft” el_class=”mb-1″][vc_custom_heading text=”What We Do?” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:2.2em|text_align:left|line_height:1.4″ use_theme_fonts=”yes” skin=”secondary” animation_delay=”200″ el_class=”mb-4″ animation_type=”fadeInLeft”][vc_custom_heading text=”Premier cybersecurity consulting company with an essential focus on cryptocurrency exchanges and blockchain security” font_container=”tag:p|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” font_weight=”600″ animation_delay=”300″ el_class=”mb-4″ animation_type=”fadeInLeft”]

These services significantly reduce the risks of your EOS application being hacked.” font_container=”tag:p|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”mb-3″][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title=”Tron Audit”][vc_custom_heading text=”TRON smart contracts are written in a high-level language; however, without a proper smart contract audit, the advantages of the protocol are useless. We conduct TRON smart contract audit to secure your clients, funds, and reputation” font_container=”tag:p|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”mb-3″][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title=”Blockchain Protocol Security”][vc_custom_heading text=”Blockchain protocol security practice consists of 3 different services that cover all security aspects of custom blockchain implementation: protocol model security review, tokenomics review and protocol implementation security analysis.” font_container=”tag:p|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”mb-3″][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title=”Formal Verification”][vc_custom_heading text=”The service supposes the use of math methods and symbolic analysis to prove that a system runs smoothly and correctly. Formal verification consists of validation and verification for better results.” font_container=”tag:p|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”mb-3″][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title=”Certified”][vc_custom_heading text=”We perform analysis based on the expert knowledge of our specialists and issues certificates at the following aspects: Solvency, Liquidity, Cyber Security, and Community” font_container=”tag:p|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”mb-3″][/vc_accordion_tab][/vc_accordion]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row wrap_container=”yes” el_class=”py-3 pt-lg-5 pb-lg-4 my-5″][vc_column offset=”vc_col-md-6″][vc_custom_heading text=”our services” font_container=”tag:h5|text_align:left|line_height:1.6″ use_theme_fonts=”yes” text_transform=”text-uppercase” font_weight=”600″ skin=”primary” letter_spacing=”0″ show_border=”yes” border_skin=”primary” border_type=”middle-border-reverse” border_size=”lg” animation_delay=”100″ animation_type=”fadeInLeft” el_class=”mb-1″][vc_custom_heading text=”Smart contract audit process” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:2.2em|text_align:left|line_height:1.4″ use_theme_fonts=”yes” skin=”secondary” animation_delay=”200″ el_class=”mb-4″ animation_type=”fadeInLeft”][vc_column_text]Code distribution

The smart contract code is distributed to several team members across the globe.

Individual auditing
All team members first analyze the code on their own, before submitting a draft of their findings.

Collaborative auditing
Once individual audit findings are put together, the results are discussed and the team proceeds to do another round of collaborative auditing.

Final report delivery

Once the collaborative auditing is done, all issues and optimization advice is documented and the report is submitted to the client.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column animation_delay=”200″
